SEARCH
Package aas_core.aas3_0.types.model

Interface ISpecificAssetId

All Superinterfaces:
IClass, IHasSemantics
All Known Implementing Classes:
EnhancedSpecificAssetId, SpecificAssetId
public interface ISpecificAssetId extends IHasSemantics
A specific asset ID describes a generic supplementary identifying attribute of the asset.

The specific asset ID is not necessarily globally unique.

Constraints:

  • Constraint AASd-133: getExternalSubjectId() shall be an external reference, i.e. Reference.getType() = ReferenceTypes.EXTERNAL_REFERENCE.
